$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

fields.description: Form field definitions keyed by field identifier. Fields define the input structure and validation rules for the form

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this form into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

allowAdditionalAnnexes.description: Whether additional ad-hoc annexes can be attached beyond those defined in the annexes record

annexes.description: Predefined annex slots keyed by identifier. Each slot can be marked as required (must be filled at runtime) or optional

parties.description: Party role definitions keyed by role identifier. Each role specifies constraints on who can fill it (person/organization) and signature requirements.

propertyNames.description: Party role identifier (e.g., buyer, seller, landlord)

additionalProperties.title: LogicExpression
additionalProperties.description: A typed computed value with optional metadata (label, description). The type property determines the expected result type and value schema.

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a boolean

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a string

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an integer

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a percentage (0-100)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a rating value

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a time (HH:MM:SS)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 datetime

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 duration string

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Phone object with number and optional type/extension expressions

type.description: Expression string to evaluate

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Coordinate object with latitude and longitude expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Bounding box with north, south, east, west boundary expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Person object with name component expressions

title.description: Expression string to evaluate

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Organization object with component expressions

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -90 (South Pole) to 90 (North Pole)

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -180 (west) to 180 (east)

southWest.description: Southwest corner coordinate (minimum latitude and longitude)

northEast.description: Northeast corner coordinate (maximum latitude and longitude)

amount.description: Monetary amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD) or as a decimal (e.g., 99.99 for USD). Negative values allowed for debts/credits

currency.description: ISO 4217 alpha-3 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

country.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "US", "GB", "FRA") or full country name

number.description: Phone number in E.164 international format (e.g., +14155552671)

type.description: Type or category of phone number (e.g., mobile, work, home)

fullName.description: Person's full name (complete name as a single string)

title.description: Name prefix or title (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr., Prof.)

suffix.description: Name suffix (e.g., Jr., Sr., III, Esq.)

legalName.description: Legal or registered name of the organization

entityType.description: Legal entity type of the organization

type.description: Type of identification document (e.g., ssn, passport, license, ein)

issuer.description: Issuing authority, country, or state (e.g., US, CA, DMV)

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

items.description: Array of checklist items. Each item represents a task, step, or requirement.

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this checklist into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

id.description: Unique identifier for the checklist item (e.g., "task-1", "step-a"). Used to link to runtime status.

title.description: Title or label for the checklist item

description.description: Detailed description or instructions for the item

status.title: StatusSpec
status.description: Specification for how checklist item status should be represented (boolean or enum).

oneOf.title: BooleanStatusSpec
oneOf.description: Boolean status (e.g., incomplete/complete) with an optional default value.

default.description: Default status value (true/false) for new instances

oneOf.title: EnumStatusSpec
oneOf.description: Enum-based status with a set of allowed options and an optional default.

value.description: Internal status value (e.g., "todo", "in-progress", "done")

label.description: Human-readable label for the status option

description.description: Optional description or help text for this status option

default.description: Default status value for new instances (must match one of the option values)

mimeType.description: MIME type of the layer content (e.g., text/markdown, application/pdf)

title.description: Human-readable title for this layer

description.description: Description of what this layer represents

bindings.description: Mapping from form field names to template target identifiers

mimeType.description: MIME type of the layer content (e.g., text/markdown, application/pdf)

title.description: Human-readable title for this layer

description.description: Description of what this layer represents

bindings.description: Mapping from form field names to template target identifiers

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the layer file

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

artifact.description: Inline artifact definition (document, form, checklist, or nested bundle)

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the artifact file

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

anyOf.description: Expression string - either inline expression or reference to a logic key

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

fields.description: Form field definitions keyed by field identifier. Fields define the input structure and validation rules for the form

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this form into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

allowAdditionalAnnexes.description: Whether additional ad-hoc annexes can be attached beyond those defined in the annexes record

annexes.description: Predefined annex slots keyed by identifier. Each slot can be marked as required (must be filled at runtime) or optional

parties.description: Party role definitions keyed by role identifier. Each role specifies constraints on who can fill it (person/organization) and signature requirements.

propertyNames.description: Party role identifier (e.g., buyer, seller, landlord)

additionalProperties.title: LogicExpression
additionalProperties.description: A typed computed value with optional metadata (label, description). The type property determines the expected result type and value schema.

step.description: Increment step (e.g., 0.5 for half stars, default: 1)

anyOf.description: Expression string - either inline expression or reference to a logic key

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -90 (South Pole) to 90 (North Pole)

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -180 (west) to 180 (east)

southWest.description: Southwest corner coordinate (minimum latitude and longitude)

northEast.description: Northeast corner coordinate (maximum latitude and longitude)

amount.description: Monetary amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD) or as a decimal (e.g., 99.99 for USD). Negative values allowed for debts/credits

currency.description: ISO 4217 alpha-3 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

country.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "US", "GB", "FRA") or full country name

number.description: Phone number in E.164 international format (e.g., +14155552671)

type.description: Type or category of phone number (e.g., mobile, work, home)

fullName.description: Person's full name (complete name as a single string)

title.description: Name prefix or title (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr., Prof.)

suffix.description: Name suffix (e.g., Jr., Sr., III, Esq.)

legalName.description: Legal or registered name of the organization

entityType.description: Legal entity type of the organization

type.description: Type of identification document (e.g., ssn, passport, license, ein)

issuer.description: Issuing authority, country, or state (e.g., US, CA, DMV)

signature.title: FormSignature

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this document into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

items.description: Array of checklist items. Each item represents a task, step, or requirement.

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this checklist into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

id.description: Unique identifier for the checklist item (e.g., "task-1", "step-a"). Used to link to runtime status.

title.description: Title or label for the checklist item

description.description: Detailed description or instructions for the item

status.title: StatusSpec
status.description: Specification for how checklist item status should be represented (boolean or enum).

oneOf.title: BooleanStatusSpec
oneOf.description: Boolean status (e.g., incomplete/complete) with an optional default value.

default.description: Default status value (true/false) for new instances

oneOf.title: EnumStatusSpec
oneOf.description: Enum-based status with a set of allowed options and an optional default.

value.description: Internal status value (e.g., "todo", "in-progress", "done")

label.description: Human-readable label for the status option

description.description: Optional description or help text for this status option

default.description: Default status value for new instances (must match one of the option values)

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata

contents.description: Ordered bundle contents. Each item has a key and is either an inline artifact, path reference, or registry reference.

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

artifact.description: Inline artifact definition (document, form, checklist, or nested bundle)

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the artifact file

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions
